We think he should have gone earlier. He has now done the right thing. I think there are questions about David Cameron 's judgment, about hanging on to him as long as he did. , where he completed 62.8 percent of his passes, blowing his previous best out of the water. "I feel like this one I had to work hard to get here," Michael Vick said.
